name: Super Scissors World
description:
Scissors must reach the other side of the bedroom. The path is full of flames, rocks and the infamous Paperzilla! Can you help scissors to overcome these challenges?

Super Scissors World is a small 2D retro platformer made for the Weekly Game Jam 154: "Rock Paper Scissors". Made with Unity using the Corgi Engine.

By:

Marco Vito Oddo - Game design/programming;

Stealthix - Art/programming;

Vitor Ornelas - Music/sfx.

Controls:

  • Arrows/Joystick: Move
  • Spacebar/Xbox A button: Jump
